Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.core
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.similarity

Interface PairwiseSimilarity

All Known Implementing Classes:
HpoResnikSimilarity, PairwiseResnikSimilarity, PrecomputingPairwiseResnikSimilarity
public interface PairwiseSimilarity
Interface for computing similarity scores between two individual terms (identified by their TermId).

Based on this, AbstractCommonAncestorSimilarity implements its scores for full TermId sets.

Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe
